revision.comment: Apache Empire-db to become a Top-Level-Project (TLP) http://empire-db.apache.org/news.htm
revision.text:
{{navbox |name = Apache |title = [[Apache Software Foundation]] |bodyclass = hlist
|group1 = Top level projects |list1 = *[[Apache Abdera|Abdera]] *[[Apache ActiveMQ|ActiveMQ]] *[[Apache Ant|Ant]] *[[Apache Aries|Aries]] *[[Apache HTTP Server]] *[[Apache Portable Runtime|APR]] *[[Apache Avro|Avro]] *[[Apache Axis|Axis]] *[[Apache Bloodhound|Bloodhound]] *[[Apache Buildr|Buildr]] *[[Apache Camel|Camel]] *[[Apache Cassandra|Cassandra]] *[[Apache Cayenne|Cayenne]] *[[Apache Chemistry|Chemistry]] *[[Apache Click|Click]] *[[Apache CloudStack|CloudStack]] *[[Apache Cocoon|Cocoon]] *[[Apache Continuum|Continuum]] *[[Apache Cordova|Cordova]] *[[CouchDB]] *[[Apache CXF|CXF]] *[[Apache Derby|Derby]] *[[Apache Directory Server|Directory]] *[[Apache Empire-db|Empire-db]] *[[Apache Felix|Felix]] *[[Apache Forrest|Forrest]] *[[Apache Geronimo|Geronimo]] *[[Apache Gora|Gora]] *[[Apache Gump|Gump]] *[[Apache Hadoop|Hadoop]] *[[Apache Hama|Hama]] *[[Apache Hive|Hive]] *[[Apache HBase|HBase]] *[[Apache Jackrabbit|Jackrabbit]] *[[Apache James|James]] *[[Apache JMeter|JMeter]] *[[Apache Karaf|Karaf]] *[[Apache Lenya|Lenya]] *[[Apache Libcloud|libcloud]] *[[Apache Mahout|Mahout]] *[[Apache Maven|Maven]] *[[Apache MINA|MINA]] *[[mod_perl]] *[[Apache MyFaces|MyFaces]] *[[Apache ODE|ODE]] *[[Apache OFBiz|OFBiz]] *[[Apache OpenEJB|OpenEJB]] *[[Apache OpenJPA|OpenJPA]] *[[OpenOffice]] *[[Apache POI|POI]] *[[Apache Pivot|Pivot]] *[[Apache Qpid|Qpid]] *[[Apache River|River]] *[[Apache Roller|Roller]] *[[Apache ServiceMix|ServiceMix]] *[[Apache Shindig|Shindig]] *[[Apache Shiro|Shiro]] *[[Apache Sling|Sling]] *[[Apache Stanbol|Stanbol]] *[[SpamAssassin]] *[[Apache C++ Standard Library|stdcxx]] *[[Apache Struts|Struts]] *[[Apache Subversion|Subversion]] *[[Apache Tapestry|Tapestry]] *[[Apache Thrift|Thrift]] *[[Apache Tomcat|Tomcat]] *[[Traffic_Server|Trafficserver]] *[[Apache Tuscany|Tuscany]] *[[UIMA]] *[[Apache Velocity|Velocity]] *[[Apache Wave|Wave]] *[[Apache Wicket|Wicket]] *[[Apache Wink|Wink]] *[[Xalan]] *[[Xerces]] *[[XMLBeans]]

|group4 = [[Lucene|Lucene Projects]] |list4 = *[[Lucene|Lucene Java]] *[[Lucene.net|Lucene.Net]] *[[Droids (Lucene)|Droids]] *[[Lucy (Lucene)|Lucy]] *[[Nutch]] *[[Open Relevance Project]] *[[PyLucene]] *[[Apache Solr|Solr]] *[[Apache Tika|Tika]]
|group5 = [[Hadoop|Hadoop Projects]] |list5 = *[[HDFS]] *[[Apache ZooKeeper|ZooKeeper]]
|group6 = Other projects |list6 = *[[Chainsaw (log file viewer)|Chainsaw]] *[[Batik (software)|Batik]] *[[Formatting Objects Processor|FOP]] *[[Log4j]] *[[Apache XAP|XAP]] *[[Apache log4net|Log4Net]] *[[Apache Ivy|Ivy]]
|group7 = [[Apache Incubator|Incubator Projects]] |list7 = *[[Apache ACE|ACE]] *[[Apache Composer|Composer]] *[[JSPWiki]] *[[Apache XAP|XAP]]
